atg.security
Class SerializedUserAuthority

java.lang.Object
  atg.security.SerializedUserAuthority

public class SerializedUserAuthority
extends java.lang.Object

This utility class manages the serialization and de-serialization of user authority objects. It ensures that all serialized objects referring to the same user authority have references to the same user authority object within a JVM, necessary to ensure that equality checks work.

There is a bug in this implementation where proxy'ed user authorities that have a round-trip serialization process done will not be resolved back to the proxy but rather to the original (proxy target) user authority.
